attributes.action: Call for an immediate general election
attributes.additional_details: We have watched the House of Commons and House of Lords debate Brexit for years and waste millions, if not billions of tax payers money due to delays. The claims that a no deal is in democratic is deplorable and the MPs need to be held accountable for their actions. We must have a chance to vote as the 361 MPs who are suppose to be representative of 65million people in the UK clearly are not. If this was a company people would be held accountable for their actions and probably made redundant.
attributes.background: The fiasco over Brexit has been a joke and the MP’s have acted against the will of the people but and  their Manifesto. The decision to leave the EU permanently with a deal or no deal must be via the will of the people and the only way to do this is by holding an election immediately.
